mapper.select: /* cetusUser.view */ SELECT CU.UID ,CU.USER_ID ,CU.PASSWORD ,CU.USER_NM ,CU.AUTHOR_CD ,CU.STATUS ,CU.FAIL_CNT ,CU.PROFILE_UID ,CU.META_DATA ,CU.USE_AT ,CU.APPROVE_AT FROM CETUS_USER CU WHERE CU.UID = #{uid}

/* cetusUser.getUserByUserId */ SELECT CU.UID ,CU.USER_ID ,CU.PASSWORD ,CU.USER_NM ,CU.AUTHOR_CD AS ROLE ,CU.STATUS ,CU.FAIL_CNT ,CU.PROFILE_UID ,CF.FILE_ID AS PROFILE_ID ,CU.META_DATA ,CU.USE_AT ,CU.APPROVE_AT ,CW.UID AS WORKPLACE_UID ,CW.NAME AS WORKPLACE_NM ,CG.UID AS GROUP_UID ,CG.NAME AS GROUP_NM ,CD.UID AS DEPT_UID ,CD.NAME AS DEPT_NM ,CP.UID AS POSITION_UID ,CP.NAME AS POSITION_NM FROM CETUS_USER CU LEFT JOIN CETUS_FILE CF ON CF.FILE_UID = CU.PROFILE_UID::BIGINT AND CF.USE_AT = 'Y' AND CF.SAVED = 'Y' INNER JOIN CETUS_WORKPLACE_USER CWU ON CWU.USER_UID = CU.UID INNER JOIN CETUS_WORKPLACE CW ON CW.UID = CWU.WORKPLACE_UID INNER JOIN CETUS_GROUP_USER CGU ON CGU.USER_UID = CU.UID INNER JOIN CETUS_GROUP CG ON CG.UID = CGU.GROUP_UID INNER JOIN CETUS_DEPT_USER CDU ON CDU.USER_UID = CU.UID INNER JOIN CETUS_DEPT CD ON CD.UID = CDU.DEPT_UID INNER JOIN CETUS_POSITION_USER CPU ON CPU.USER_UID = CU.UID INNER JOIN CETUS_POSITION CP ON CP.UID = CPU.POSITION_UID WHERE CU.USER_ID = #{userId}

/* cetusUser.getUserInfoByUid */ SELECT CU.UID ,CU.USER_ID ,CU.PASSWORD ,CU.USER_NM ,CU.AUTHOR_CD AS ROLE ,CU.STATUS ,CU.FAIL_CNT ,CU.PROFILE_UID ,CF.FILE_ID AS PROFILE_ID ,CU.META_DATA ,CU.USE_AT ,CU.APPROVE_AT ,CW.UID AS WORKPLACE_UID ,CW.NAME AS WORKPLACE_NM ,CG.UID AS GROUP_UID ,CG.NAME AS GROUP_NM ,CD.UID AS DEPT_UID ,CD.NAME AS DEPT_NM ,CP.UID AS POSITION_UID ,CP.NAME AS POSITION_NM FROM CETUS_USER CU LEFT JOIN CETUS_FILE CF ON CF.FILE_UID = CU.PROFILE_UID::BIGINT AND CF.USE_AT = 'Y' AND CF.SAVED = 'Y' INNER JOIN CETUS_WORKPLACE_USER CWU ON CWU.USER_UID = CU.UID INNER JOIN CETUS_WORKPLACE CW ON CW.UID = CWU.WORKPLACE_UID INNER JOIN CETUS_GROUP_USER CGU ON CGU.USER_UID = CU.UID INNER JOIN CETUS_GROUP CG ON CG.UID = CGU.GROUP_UID INNER JOIN CETUS_DEPT_USER CDU ON CDU.USER_UID = CU.UID INNER JOIN CETUS_DEPT CD ON CD.UID = CDU.DEPT_UID INNER JOIN CETUS_POSITION_USER CPU ON CPU.USER_UID = CU.UID INNER JOIN CETUS_POSITION CP ON CP.UID = CPU.POSITION_UID WHERE CU.UID = #{uid}
